channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gunman started Idaho blaze and then fatally shot 2 firefighters in ambush attack, officials say
item.description: Authorities say a man armed with a rifle started a wildfire and then began shooting at first responders in a northern Idaho mountain community, killing two firefighters and wounding a third.

item.title: A violent ambush in Idaho leaves 2 firefighters dead and 1 injured. What to know about the attack
